ThingDef.label: Tier 1 kit
ThingDef.description: Tier 1 kit with tools used in creating bionics. \nIs equipped with simple tools and some plasteel.

ThingDef.label: Tier 2 kit
ThingDef.description: Tier 2 kit with tools used in creating bionics.\nIs equipped with advanced tools and some plasteel, silver and components.

ThingDef.label: Tier 3 kit
ThingDef.description: Tier 3 kit with tools used in creating bionics. \nIs equipped with advanced tools and some plasteel, silver, uranium and advanced components.

ThingDef.label: Wooden jaw
ThingDef.description: Jaw replacement made out of wood. \nSmells gross and tastes even worse.

ThingDef.label: wooden shoulder-arm
ThingDef.description: Arm replacement made out of wood. \nLooks bad, feels bad, is bad.

ThingDef.label: wooden leg
ThingDef.description: Leg replacement made out of wood. \nLooks bad, feels bad, is bad.

ThingDef.label: artificial nose
ThingDef.description: Nose replacement made out of steel. \nCovers the hole in the face and also allows the user to smell simple substances.

ThingDef.label: artificial ear
ThingDef.description: Ear replacement made out of steel. \nCovers the hole in the head and also allows the user to hear simple sounds.

ThingDef.label: artificial eye
ThingDef.description: eye replacement made out of steel. \nCan detect light and even distance. Like looking through camera but without the colors.

ThingDef.label: simple hydraulic jaw
ThingDef.description: Jaw replacement made out of steel. \nIt doesn't smell anymore and allows the user to feel simple tastes!

ThingDef.label: simple hydraulic shoulder-arm
ThingDef.description: Arm replacement made out of steel. \nWay more comfortable and useful than wooden one.

ThingDef.label: simple hydraulic leg
ThingDef.description: Leg replacement made out of steel. \nWay more comfortable and useful than wooden one.

ThingDef.label: bionic shoulder-arm
ThingDef.description: Arm replacement made out of plasteel. \nGives the user extreme strength.

ThingDef.label: bionic leg
ThingDef.description: Leg replacement made out of plasteel. \nGives its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.

ThingDef.label: bionic nose
ThingDef.description: Nose replacement made out of plasteel. \nGives its owner extreme sense of smell.

ThingDef.label: bionic ear
ThingDef.description: Ear replacement made out of plasteel. \nAllows you to hear normal again.

ThingDef.label: bionic eye
ThingDef.description: Eye replacement made out of plasteel. \nGives supernatural vision abilities.

ThingDef.label: bionic jaw
ThingDef.description: Jaw replacement made out of plasteel. \nLets you eat normal again, also comes with a voice modulator.

ThingDef.label: mute jaw
ThingDef.description: Jaw replacement made out of plasteel. This version of the bionic jaw comes without a voice modulator, useful for loud patients.

ThingDef.label: bionic spine
ThingDef.description: Spine replacement made out of plasteel.

ThingDef.label: bionic pelvis
ThingDef.description: Pelvis replacement made out of plasteel.

ThingDef.label: bionic neck
ThingDef.description: Neck implant made out of plasteel. It has slow transmition speed.

ThingDef.label: medical sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel. \nEquipped with little blood filters and antibiotics-dispensers to keep the user healthy.

ThingDef.label: drugged sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel. \nEquipped with little flake-dispensers to keep the user happy. Synthetic liver highly recommended.

ThingDef.label: adrenaline sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel. \nEquipped with little adrenaline-dispensers to keep the user fit and fast.

ThingDef.label: painkiller sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel. \nEquipped with little morphine-dispensers to numb the user's pain. Side effects are respiratory ailments.

ThingDef.label: nanomachines ribcage replacement
ThingDef.description: Ribcage replacement made out of plasteel. \nEquipped with little nanomachines-dispensers to numb the user's wounds.

ThingDef.label: artificial brain
ThingDef.description:
Brain implant made out of steel. 
A small device that does its best to keep its user brain to work. 
Recommended for severe brain damage only. 
Worth remembering that it limits the brain power! (100%)

ThingDef.label: artificial lung
ThingDef.description: Lung replacement made out of steel. \nMakes a loud noise.

ThingDef.label: artificial stomach
ThingDef.description: Stomach replacement made out of steel. \nI wouldn't smell that!

ThingDef.label: artificial liver
ThingDef.description: Liver replacement made out of steel. \nNot a lot better than normal coffee filter.

ThingDef.label: artificial kidney
ThingDef.description: Kidney replacement made out of steel. \nBetter than dialysis, trust me!, trust me...

ThingDef.label: artificial heart
ThingDef.description: Heart replacement made out of steel. \nKeep the bloodstream running.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic shoulder-arm
ThingDef.description: Arm replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nGives the user extremely extreme strength.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic leg
ThingDef.description: Leg replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nDo you remember what walking was? \nMe neither.

ThingDef.label: exoskeleton
ThingDef.description: Exoskeleton made out of plasteel and silver. \nMakes the user stronger.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic nose
ThingDef.description: Nose replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nGives its owner extreme sense of smell.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic ear
ThingDef.description: Ear replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nAllows you to hear even better now!

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic eye
ThingDef.description: Eye replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nGives supernatural vision abilities.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic jaw
ThingDef.description: Jaw replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nLets you eat like a monster!

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic spine
ThingDef.description: Spine replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nThis light device is awesome!

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic pelvis
ThingDef.description: Pelvis replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nThis light device is awesome!

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic neck
ThingDef.description: Neck implant made out of plasteel and silver. \nThis light device is awesome! \nIt has semi-good transition speed.

ThingDef.label: advanced medical sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nEquipped with little blood filters and antibiotics-dispensers to keep the user healthy.

ThingDef.label: advanced drugged sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nEquipped with little flake-dispensers to keep the user happy. Synthetic liver highly recommended.

ThingDef.label: advanced adrenaline sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nEquipped with little adrenaline-dispensers to keep the user fit and fast.

ThingDef.label: advanced painkiller sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nEquipped with little morphine-dispensers to numb the user's pain. Side effects are respiratory ailments.

ThingDef.label: advanced nanomachines ribcage replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nEquipped with little nanomachines-dispensers to numb the user's wounds.

ThingDef.label: Advanced brain
ThingDef.description: Brain implant made out of plasteel and silver. \nMakes users brain work better and upgrades it slightly.\n(Makes you hungry more often)

ThingDef.label: synthetic lung
ThingDef.description: Lung replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nMakes a quiet noise.

ThingDef.label: synthetic stomach
ThingDef.description: Stomach replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nIt doesn't smell anymore.

ThingDef.label: synthetic liver
ThingDef.description: Liver replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nIt filters the blood really well.

ThingDef.label: synthetic kidney
ThingDef.description: Kidney replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nYou can drink again without problems!

ThingDef.label: synthetic heart
ThingDef.description: Heart replacement made out of plasteel and silver. \nKeeps the bloodstream running.

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic shoulder-arm
ThingDef.description: Arm replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nThis one is F%^$^ng insane.

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic leg
ThingDef.description: Leg replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nI am so fast i live in the dark.

ThingDef.label: ultra exoskeleton
ThingDef.description: Exoskeleton made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nI feel as strong as an ant!

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic nose
ThingDef.description: Nose replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nHas someone farted? \nOh the raiders...

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic ear
ThingDef.description: Ear replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \n"I can hear you!"

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic eye
ThingDef.description: Eye replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nIsn't it cheating?

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic jaw
ThingDef.description: Jaw replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nHey, chew that sandwich for me!

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic spine
ThingDef.description: Spine replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nHave I always been so light?

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic pelvis
ThingDef.description: Pelvis replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nHave I always been so light?

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic neck
ThingDef.description: Neck implant made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nHave I always been so light?

ThingDef.label: ultra medical sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nEquipped with little blood filters and antibiotics-dispensers to keep the user healthy.

ThingDef.label: ultra drugged sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nEquipped with little flake-dispensers to keep the user happy. Synthetic liver highly recommended.

ThingDef.label: ultra adrenaline sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nEquipped with little adrenaline-dispensers to keep the user fit and fast.

ThingDef.label: ultra painkiller sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: Sternum replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nEquipped with little morphine-dispensers to numb the user's pain. Side effects are respiratory ailments.

ThingDef.label: ultra nanomachines ribcage replacement
ThingDef.description: Ribcage replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nEquipped with little nanomachines-dispensers to numb the user's wounds.

ThingDef.label: ultra brain
ThingDef.description: Brain implant made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nMakes users brain work like a genius. \n(Makes you hungry more often)

ThingDef.label: ultra lung
ThingDef.description: Lung replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nMakes a no noise.

ThingDef.label: ultra stomach
ThingDef.description: Stomach replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nThe farts became Deadly o-O.

ThingDef.label: ultra liver
ThingDef.description: Liver replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nIs it still blood or something else?.

ThingDef.label: ultra kidney
ThingDef.description: Kidney replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nThe "drinks" are just water!

ThingDef.label: ultra heart
ThingDef.description: Heart replacement made out of plasteel and silver enhanced with uranium. \nKeeps the bloodstream running.
